entry.title: k
entry.content: class Solution {public:    int minSubArrayLen(int target, vector<int>& nums) {         unsigned int sum = 0;         unsigned short left = 0, right = 0;         int minlen = 1e5;        for(right = 0; right < nums.size(); right++){            sum += nums[right];            while(left <= right && sum >= target){                minlen = min(minlen, right-left+1);                 sum -=nums[left];                left++;            }        }        return minlen == 1e5 ? 0 : minlen;            }};

class Solution{public:    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int> &nums)    {        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end()); //         vector<vector<int>> b;        int n = nums.size();        if (n >= 3){ // 3             int i = 0;            while (i < n - 2)            {                twoSum(nums, i, b);                int temp = nums[i];                while (i < nums.size() && nums[i] == temp)                    ++i;            }        }        return b;    }    void twoSum(vector<int> &nums, int i, vector<vector<int>> &result)    {        int j = i + 1;        int k = nums.size() - 1;        while (j < k)        {            if (nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] == 0)            {                result.push_back({nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]});                int temp = nums[j];                while (nums[j] == temp && j < k)                {                    ++j;                }            }            else if (nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] < 0)            {                ++j;            }            else                --k;        }    }};

class Solution{public:    vector<int> twoSum(vector<int> &numbers, int target)    {        int left = 0;        int right = numbers.size() - 1;        while (left < right)        {            if(numbers[left] + numbers[right] == target)                return {left,right};            if (numbers[left] + numbers[right] > target)            {                right--;            }            else                left++;        }        return {-1,-1};    }};

class Solution{public:    int singleNumber(std::vector<int> &nums)    { //   232        vector<int> bits(32,0);        int value[32];        for (int num: nums)        {            for (int j = 0; j < 32; j++)            {                bits[j] += (num >> (31-j)) & 1; // 31            }        }        int result = 0;        for (int i = 0; i < 32; i++)        {            result =  (result << 1)  + bits[i] % 3;        }        return result;    }};

#include <stdio.h>#include <string>#include <algorithm>class Solution{public:    std::string a = "11";    std::string b = "10";    std::string c = "";    std::string d = "";    std::string addBinary(std::string a, std::string b)    {        int i = 0, j = 0;        int va = 0, vb = 0;        int jinwei = 0;        int cur = 0;        int sum = 0;        i = a.length();        j = b.length();        while (i >= 0 || j >= 0)        {            va = i >= 0 ? a[i--] - '0' : 0;            vb = j >= 0 ? b[j--] - '0' : 0;            sum = va + vb + jinwei;            jinwei = sum >= 2 ? 1 : 0;            sum = sum >= 2 ? sum - 2 : sum;            c.append(std::to_string(sum));        }        if (jinwei == 1)        {            c.append(std::to_string(1));        }        reverse(c.begin(), c.end());        return c;    }};int main(void){    std::string d = "";    Solution s;    d = s.addBinary(s.a, s.b);    printf("%s", d);    return 0;}

class Solution{public:    std::string c = "";    std::string addBinary(std::string a, std::string b)    {        int i = 0, j = 0;        int va = 0, vb = 0;        int jinwei = 0;        int cur = 0;        int sum = 0;        i = a.length()-1;        j = b.length()-1;        while (i >= 0 || j >= 0)        {            va = i >= 0 ? a[i--] - '0' : 0;            vb = j >= 0 ? b[j--] - '0' : 0;            sum = va + vb + jinwei;            jinwei = sum >= 2 ? 1 : 0;            sum = sum >= 2 ? sum - 2 : sum;            c.append(std::to_string(sum));        }        if (jinwei == 1)        {            c.append(std::to_string(1));        }        reverse(c.begin(), c.end());        return c;    }};

class Solution {    int zfjs = 2;    int flag = 0;public:    int Judge(int a, int b) // 0     {        if(a == 0x80000000 &&  b == -1){            flag = 1;        }        if(a == 0x80000000 &&  b == 1){            flag = 2;        }        if (b == 0)            return 1;        return 0;    }    int pretreatment(int *a, int *b) //  a  b b0    {        Judge(*a, *b); // 0   0         if (*a > 0)        {            zfjs--;            *a = -*a;        }        if (*b > 0)        {            zfjs--;            *b = -*b;        }        return 0;    }    int divide(int a, int b)    {        int result = 0;        pretreatment(&a, &b);        if(flag == 1){            return 0x7FFFFFFF;        }        if(flag == 2){            return -2147483648;                    }        while (a <= b)        {            //             int value = b;            int shang = 1;            while (value >= 0xc0000000 && a <= value + value) // int_min && a < 1248             {                shang += shang; //                 value += value; //             }            result += shang;            a -= value;        }        return zfjs == 1 ? -result : result;    }};

import numpy as npimport cv2from socket import *s = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM) # UDPaddr = ('192.168.245.1', 8084)  # 0.0.0.0s.bind(addr)s.setblocking(0) # while True:    data = None    try:        data, _ = s.recvfrom(921600)        receive_data = np.frombuffer(data, dtype='uint8')        r_img = cv2.imdecode(receive_data, 1)        cv2.putText(r_img, "server", (50, 50), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 1, (255, 0, 0), 2)        cv2.imshow('server', r_img)    except BlockingIOError as e:        pass    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == ord('q'):        breakcv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2from socket import *# 127.0.0.1IPipaddr = ('192.168.245.1', 8084)cap = cv2.VideoCapture(0)# 640x480cap.set(cv2.CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH, 640)cap.set(cv2.CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT, 480)s = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM) # UDPwhile True:    _, img = cap.read()    img = cv2.flip(img, 1)    #     _, send_data = cv2.imencode('.jpg', img, [cv2.IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY, 50])    s.sendto(send_data, addr)    print(f':{img.size} Byte')    cv2.putText(img, "client", (50, 50), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 1, (255, 0, 0), 2)    cv2.imshow('client', img)    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == ord('q'):        breaks.close()cv2.destroyAllWindows()

 //0xFFFF                                           lianjie.outputStream.write(text1.getBytes());                                        while (js <= imglen_int) {                                            int recelen = 0; //truebitmapnull                                        if(opts == null){                                            bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(img, 0, img.length);                                        }else{                                            bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeByteArray(img, 0, img.length, opts);                                    receive.append("" + "\r\n");                                }                            });                        }                    }                }).start();            }        });        //      OK a b         connect.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {            @Override            public void onClick(View v) {//                a = ip.getText().toString();//                String c = port.getText().toString();//                if ("".equals(a) || "".equals(c)) {//                    Toast.makeText(MainActivity.this, "ip", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();//                    receive.append("ip" + "\r\n");//                } else {//                    b = Integer.parseInt(c); package com.example.myapplication;import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;import android.os.Bundle;import android.view.View;import android.widget.Button;import android.widget.TextView;public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity implements View.OnClickListener {    TextView textView;    Button bt0, bt1, bt2, bt3, bt4, bt5, bt6, bt7, bt8, bt9, bt10, bt11, bt12, bt13, bt14, bt15, bt16;    private final Integer[] id = {R.id.Button0, R.id.button1, R.id.button2, R.id.button3,            R.id.button4, R.id.button5, R.id.button6, R.id.button7,R.id.button8, R.id.button9,            R.id.button10,R.id.button11,R.id.button12, R.id.button13, R.id.button14, R.id.button15, R.id.button16};    Button[] buttons = new Button[]{bt0, bt1, bt2, bt3, bt4, bt5, bt6, bt7, bt8, bt9, bt10, bt11, bt12, bt13, bt14, bt15, bt16};    String result = "";    boolean isclickeq = false;  //  =      String strnum1, strnum2 = "";    double num1, num2 = 0.0;    String op = "";    double an = 0.0;    int flag_jia, flag_jian, flag_cheng, flag_chu = 0;    @Override    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);        textView = findViewById(R.id.TextView1);        for (int i = 0; i < buttons.length; i++) {            buttons[i] = (Button) findViewById(id[i]);        }        for (Button button : buttons) {            button.setOnClickListener(this);        }    }    @Override    public void onClick(View view) {        switch (view.getId()) {            case R.id.Button0:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "0";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button1:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "1";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button2:                result += "2";                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button3:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "3";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button4:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "4";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button5:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "5";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button6:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "6";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button7:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "7";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button8:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "8";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button9:                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                result += "9";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button10:                strnum1 = textView.getText().toString().trim();     //                if (strnum1.equals("")) break;                num1 = Double.parseDouble(strnum1);                result = "";                textView.setText("");                op = "+";                isclickeq = false;                break;            case R.id.button11:                strnum1 = textView.getText().toString().trim();                if(strnum1.equals("")) break;                num1 = Double.parseDouble(strnum1);                result = "";                textView.setText(result);                op = "-";                isclickeq = false;                break;            case R.id.button12:                strnum1 = textView.getText().toString().trim();                if(strnum1.equals("")) break;                num1 = Double.parseDouble(strnum1);                result = "";                textView.setText(result);                op = "*";                isclickeq = false;                break;            case R.id.button13:                strnum1 = textView.getText().toString().trim();                if(strnum1.equals("")) break;                num1 = Double.parseDouble(strnum1);                result = "";                textView.setText(result);                op = "/";                isclickeq = false;                break;            case R.id.button15:        //                if (isclickeq) {                    isclickeq = false;                    textView.setText("");                }                if (result.length() > 0)                    result = result.substring(0, result.length() - 1);                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button16:     //                result = "";                textView.setText(result);                break;            case R.id.button14:     //     =                 strnum2 = textView.getText().toString().trim();                if (strnum2.equals("")) break;                num2 = Double.parseDouble(strnum2);                result = "";                textView.setText("");                switch (op) {                    case "+":                        an = num1 + num2;                        break;                    case "-":                        an = num1 - num2;                        break;                    case "*":                        an = num1 * num2;                        break;                    case "/":                        if (num2 == 0) break;                        an = num1 / num2;                        break;                    default:                        an = 0.00;                        break;                }                textView.setText(an + "");                op = "";                isclickeq = true;        }    }}

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# @Time    : 2023/4/15 14:12# @Author  : Wyt# @File    : .pyimport cv2import camera_configsimport mathcap1 = cv2.VideoCapture(1 + cv2.CAP_DSHOW)cv2.VideoCapture.set(cap1, 3, 640)  # Property identifierintcv2.VideoCapture.set(cap1, 4, 640)  # ,3CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH,270.1270# cap2 = cv2.VideoCapture(2 + cv2.CAP_DSHOW)cv2.VideoCapture.set(cap2, 3, 640)cv2.VideoCapture.set(cap2, 4, 640)# def onmouse_pick_points(event, x, y, flags, param):    if event == cv2.EVENT_LBUTTONDOWN:        threeD = param        print('\n x = %d, y = %d' % (x, y))        # print("", threeD[y][x][0], threeD[y][x][1], threeD[y][x][2], "mm")        print("xyz ", threeD[y][x][0] / 1000.0, threeD[y][x][1] / 1000.0, threeD[y][x][2] / 1000.0, "m")        distance = math.sqrt(threeD[y][x][0] ** 2 + threeD[y][x][1] ** 2 + threeD[y][x][2] ** 2)        distance = distance / 1000.0  # mm -> m        print("", distance, "m")WIN_NAME = 'Deep'cv2.namedWindow(WIN_NAME, cv2.WINDOW_AUTOSIZE)while True:    ret1, frame1 = cap1.read()    ret2, frame2 = cap2.read()    imgL = cv2.cvtColor(frame1, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)  # BGR    imgR = cv2.cvtColor(frame2, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)    # cv2.remap     # MATLAB    img1_rectified = cv2.remap(imgL, camera_configs.left_map1, camera_configs.left_map2, cv2.INTER_LINEAR)    img2_rectified = cv2.remap(imgR, camera_configs.right_map1, camera_configs.right_map2, cv2.INTER_LINEAR)    imageL = cv2.cvtColor(img1_rectified, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2BGR)    imageR = cv2.cvtColor(img2_rectified, cv2.COLOR_GRAY2BGR)    # BM    numberOfDisparities = ((640 // 8) + 15) & -16  # 640    stereo = cv2.StereoBM_create(numDisparities=16, blockSize=9)  #     stereo.setROI1(camera_configs.validPixROI1)    stereo.setROI2(camera_configs.validPixROI2)    stereo.setPreFilterCap(31)    stereo.setBlockSize(15)    stereo.setMinDisparity(0)    stereo.setNumDisparities(numberOfDisparities)    stereo.setTextureThreshold(10)    stereo.setUniquenessRatio(15)    stereo.setSpeckleWindowSize(100)    stereo.setSpeckleRange(32)    stereo.setDisp12MaxDiff(1)    disparity = stereo.compute(img1_rectified, img2_rectified)  #     disp = cv2.normalize(disparity, disparity, alpha=0, beta=255, norm_type=cv2.NORM_MINMAX, dtype=cv2.CV_8U)  #     threeD = cv2.reprojectImageTo3D(disparity, camera_configs.Q, handleMissingValues=True)  #     threeD = threeD * 16    # threeD[y][x] x:0~640; y:0~480;   !!!!!!!!!!    cv2.setMouseCallback(WIN_NAME, onmouse_pick_points, threeD)    cv2.imshow("left", frame1)    # cv2.imshow("right", frame2)    # cv2.imshow("left_r", imgL)    # cv2.imshow("right_r", imgR)    cv2.imshow(WIN_NAME, disp)  #     key = cv2.waitKey(1)    if key == ord("q"):        breakcap1.release()cv2.destroyAllWindows()

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-# import face_recognitionimport cv2video_capture = cv2.VideoCapture(0)# chenduling_image = face_recognition.load_image_file("left0.jpg")chenduling_face_encoding = face_recognition.face_encodings(chenduling_image)[0]# sunyizheng_image = face_recognition.load_image_file("./picture/face1.jpg")sunyizheng_face_encoding = face_recognition.face_encodings(sunyizheng_image)[0]# zhangzetian_image = face_recognition.load_image_file("./picture/face1.jpg")zhangzetian_face_encoding = face_recognition.face_encodings(zhangzetian_image)[0]# Create arrays of known face encodings and their names# known_face_encodings = [    chenduling_face_encoding,    sunyizheng_face_encoding,    zhangzetian_face_encoding]# known_face_names = [    "master",    "sunyizheng",    "chenduling"]face_locations = []face_encodings = []face_names = []process_this_frame = Truewhile True:    flag = 0    #     ret, frame = video_capture.read()    #     small_frame = cv2.resize(frame, (0, 0), fx=0.25, fy=0.25)    # opencvBGRRGB    rgb_small_frame = small_frame[:, :, ::-1]    # Only process every other frame of video to save time    if process_this_frame:        # encodingtrueflase        face_locations = face_recognition.face_locations(rgb_small_frame)        face_encodings = face_recognition.face_encodings(rgb_small_frame, face_locations)        face_names = []        for face_encoding in face_encodings:            # unknown            matches = face_recognition.compare_faces(known_face_encodings, face_encoding)            name = "Unknown"            # if match[0]:            #     name = "michong"            # If a match was found in known_face_encodings, just use the first one.            if True in matches:                flag = 1                first_match_index = matches.index(True)                name = known_face_names[first_match_index]            face_names.append(name)    process_this_frame = not process_this_frame    #     for (top, right, bottom, left), name in zip(face_locations, face_names):        # Scale back up face locations since the frame we detected in was scaled to 1/4 size        top *= 4        right *= 4        bottom *= 4        left *= 4        #         cv2.rectangle(frame, (left, top), (right, bottom), (0, 0, 255), 2)        #         cv2.rectangle(frame, (left, bottom - 35), (right, bottom), (0, 0, 255), cv2.FILLED)        font = cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_DUPLEX        cv2.putText(frame, name, (left + 6, bottom - 6), font, 1.0, (255, 255, 255), 1)    # Display    cv2.imshow('monitor', frame)    # Q    if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == ord('q'):        break    #     if flag == 1:        print("")video_capture.release()cv2.destroyAllWindows()

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

#include <stdio.h>#include <pthread.h>#include <windows.h>#define N 100#define true 1#define producerNum  10#define consumerNum  5#define sleepTime 1000typedef int semaphore;typedef int item;item buffer[N] = {0};int in = 0;int out = 0;int proCount = 0;semaphore mutex = 1, empty = N, full = 0, proCmutex = 1;void * producer(void * a){    while(true){        while(proCmutex <= 0);        proCmutex--;        proCount++;        printf("ID%d, %d
",proCount,in);        proCmutex++;        while(empty <= 0){            printf("
");        }        empty--;        while(mutex <= 0);        mutex--;        buffer[in] = proCount;        in = (in + 1) % N;        mutex++;        full++;        Sleep(sleepTime);    }}void * consumer(void *b){    while(true){        while(full <= 0){            printf("
");        }        full--;        while(mutex <= 0);        mutex--;        int nextc = buffer[out];        buffer[out] = 0;//0        out = (out + 1) % N;        mutex++;        empty++;        printf("				ID%d,%d
", nextc,out);        Sleep(sleepTime);    }}int main(){    pthread_t threadPool[producerNum+consumerNum];    int i;    for(i = 0; i < producerNum; i++){        pthread_t temp;        if(pthread_create(&temp, NULL, producer, NULL) == -1){            printf("ERROR, fail to create producer%d
", i);            exit(1);        }        threadPool[i] = temp;    }//    for(i = 0; i < consumerNum; i++){        pthread_t temp;        if(pthread_create(&temp, NULL, consumer, NULL) == -1){            printf("ERROR, fail to create consumer%d
", i);            exit(1);        }        threadPool[i+producerNum] = temp;    }//    void * result;    for(i = 0; i < producerNum+consumerNum; i++){        if(pthread_join(threadPool[i], &result) == -1){            printf("fail to recollect
");            exit(1);        }    }//    return 0;}
